Name-Akash Tripathi
Print the series

3 5 8 12 17 23 30 38
==========================================================================================================================
package Assignment;

public class series15 {

	/**
	 * @param args
	 */
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int s=3;
		System.out.print("Pattern is: " + s + " ");
		for(int i=2;i<10;i++){
			s=s+i;
			System.out.print( s + " ");
			
		}

	}

}
